author: undetermined
full_text:
Viral Video Does Not Show Waheeda Rehman Dancing To Old Bollywood Hit

Claim: Video shows 85-year-old actor Waheeda Rehman dancing to 'Aaj Phir Jeene ka Tamanna Hai'.

Fact: Video shows Sunila Ashok, a retired teacher.

Several social media users are circulating a video of an elderly woman dancing to an old Bollywood song 'Aaj Phir Jeene ka Tamanna Hai', claiming it to show veteran actor Waheeda Rehman, while applauding her grace and elegance at the age of 85.

Fact Check:
Newschecker first ran a keyword search "Aaj Phir Jeene ka Tamanna Hai Waheeda Rehman dance", which led to a YouTube video dated January 2, 2022, uploaded by a channel, Mayookha, stating the dance was choreographed by Anoushka Sachdeva.

A further search led to the Instagram page of the dancer, Sunila Ashok. Her first pinned post, dated September 27, 2023, is the viral video. Ashok states that the video is not of the veteran actor, saying, "Woke up this morning to a flurry of messages from my family & friends. My video for 'Aaj phir jeene ki Tamanna hai' seems to have gone viral as Waheeda Rahman's dance video! I am greatly honoured to be compared to her and I am overwhelmed with all the love and appreciation I am getting from my viewers!"

We learned through another Instagram post that Ashok was a retired teacher participating in a reality show called Superstar after Retirement. When reached out to, Ashok confirmed it was her in the viral video. "I am honoured to be compared to the legendary actress Waheeda Rahman. I am a huge fan of her dancing and acting skills, so I was thrilled when my video went viral. Dance has been a childhood passion for me. I rediscovered this passion during the lockdown," Ashok said.

Conclusion:
Viral video of a senior citizen dancing to an old Bollywood song has been misattributed to actor Waheeda Rehman.

Result: False

Sources:
- YouTube video, Mayookha, January 2, 2022
- Instagram post, September 27, 2022
title: Fact: Viral video of a senior citizen dancing to an old Bollywood song has been misattributed to actor Waheeda Rehman.
vclaim: A viral video showing an elderly woman dancing to 'Aaj Phir Jeene ka Tamanna Hai' was falsely attributed to 85-year-old actor Waheeda Rehman, when it actually shows Sunila Ashok, a retired teacher.
